com.novartis.opensource.yada.plugin

Interface Postprocess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPostprocessor, CachedQueryUpdater, ScriptPostprocessor, XSLPostprocessor

    public interface Postprocess
    The Postprocess Plugin API is intended to provide a means for transformation of query results after retrieval from data sources, before returning to the client.
    Author:
    David Varon

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void engage(YADAQuery yq)
      The public API for query result post-processing
      String engage(YADARequest yadaReq, String result)
      The public API for request result post-processing

    • Method Detail

      • engage

        String engage(YADARequest yadaReq,
            String result)
              throws YADAPluginException
        The public API for request result post-processing
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        result - the content to transform
        Returns:
        a String containing the transformed content
        Throws:
        YADAPluginException - when any error occurs during processing

      • engage

        void engage(YADAQuery yq)
            throws YADAPluginException
        The public API for query result post-processing
        Parameters:
        yq - the query to post process
        Throws:
        YADAPluginException - when plugin execution fails
